name: OpenBuild
fullText:
🚀IdeaTON Mini Hackathon is coming to Shenzhen!
Join TON @ton_blockchain  & Openbuild for #IdeaTON Hackathon on July 12!

🔥 Phase 1: Live Coding Session
- Build TG Bots & Mini Apps with TON DevRel Lead Andrew @andrew_c_ton 
- Pitch ANY project idea & form teams on-site

🏆 Phase https://t.co/5AXb42dviS

name: Colosseum
fullText:
Hackathon winners will emerge from the arena in the next several hours.

It will be a time for victory, for loss, and most importantly, a time to realize that no matter the results, this is the start of your journey, not the end. https://t.co/6DKGFvicFn

name: 0xkevin (🖤 , 💙)
fullText:
#BTC 迎来局部牛市，意思是除了比特币以外其他币不涨反跌，而比特币距离前高仅一步之遥

BTC 作为数字硬通货，最大的缺点是不能像其他加密货币一样释放流动性

虽然这几年一直有项目在解决这个痛处，但核心的安全性和开放性一直无法同时兼顾

直到 Botanix 出现，这一切出现转机

Botanix 项目诞生于 https://t.co/Hs1zVPIQMR
